page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: THERE ARE 19 KINDS OF EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS IN OUR AREA RANGING FORM FIRST SCHOOLS TO POLYTECHNICS. A TYPICAL EXAMPLE OF MIDDLE SCHOOL EDUCATION IS MY SCHOOL, BRAMLEY C of E.THERE ARE 16 CLASSES AT MY SCHOOL WHICH HAVE BETWEEN 30 AND 35 PUPILS.MOST CLASSES ARE TAUGHT MATHS, ENGLISH,FRENCH,HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY,SCIEN CE,RE,MUSIC,PE/GAMES,CDT,HOME ECNOMICS,HEALTH AND ART.THE SCHOOL RUNS MANY SPORTS TEAMS AND CLUBS FOR BOTH BOYS+GIRLS.MANY DIFFERENT TRIPS ARE RUN FROM SCHOOL WHICH CATER FOR ALL TASTES.THIS YEAR TRIPS HAVE BEEN RUN TO FRANCE,HOLLAND,ITALY AND INGLEBROUGH HALL AND MANY OTHER DAY TRIPS AND EDUCATIONAL TRIPS. {RICHARD WITHAM.
